Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.responses

Class Reply

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.common.responses.Response
it.polimi.ingsw.common.responses.Reply
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AckReply, GamesListReply, NackReply
public abstract class Reply extends Response
This class represents a Reply, in other words a message from the server to the client associated to a specific request made by the client.
